attributes.action: Remove the current procedure for the PGCE Skills test - Literacy and Numeracy
attributes.additional_details: These tests in no way reflect your quality of teaching and your ability as a teacher. They shouldn't be solely based on literacy and numeracy and ignore your level of academic entry grades and teaching experience.
attributes.background: To withdraw the literacy and numeracy tests for PGCE applications. We are losing talented trainee teachers because of these QTS tests. The government requires you to wait two years to re-sit these tests so in effect your career is deferred for two years regardless of your teaching practice.
